main event: On January 6, 1949, at Kirtland Air Force Base, Pfc. Meredith J. Everitt observed a bright diamond-shaped object moving across the sky.
interesting points: The object was bright white in color and approximately two feet long., The object was traveling from Southeast to Northwest at a high speed, much faster than any jet aircraft., Pfc. Everitt estimated the object was at an altitude of 1500 to 2000 feet., The sky was clear during the observation., No other visible colors or vapor trails were noted around the object.
witness description: Pfc. Meredith J. Everitt, a guard at the airbase with flight school experience.
